name: Wehilani Tonono
story: Wehilani Tonono was born and raised in a small village in the Caribbean, where she learned to survive on her own at a young age. She was recruited by the INDEPENDENT faction for her outstanding survival skills and her fearlessness in the face of danger. As a Private under the command of Solomon Maru, Wehilani strives to prove herself as a valuable asset to her team. She is a dedicated soldier who is always eager to take on any challenge that comes her way.
